name: Lombardo & Partners
description: LOMBARDO is a full service Advertising, Branding & Consulting firm headquartered in West Palm Beach, FL with offices in LA and NYC. We are Creatively Focused and Results Driven. Our executive team brings big agency skills, discipline and experience to one of the few remaining mid-size agencies in the US.  We know that the only way to satisfy a client is by always doing what’s right for the Brand and client ROI.
